Mailing Address: PO Box 9311Stn Prov GovtVictoria, BC     V8W 9N1
Service Details: - Offers free information and resources to support informed choices and healthy behaviours with respect to gambling participation - Free treatment and support services are also available for anyone struggling with their own or a loved one’s gambling - Telephone services are multilingual - Website offers information on understanding gambling, responsible gambling, prevention and education, problem gambling, getting help and resources and links
Languages: English ; English and services are available in 13 different languages
